casebody.data:
Third Department,

June, 1960

(June 2, 1960) The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v. Claude Poole, Appellant.

Application for an extension of time within which to perfect appeal. Application granted and time is extended for 90 days. Present — Bergan, P. J., Coon, Gibson, Herlihy and Reynolds, JJ.
